4

    ORG 0
    LDA A
    ADD B
    STA C
    HLT
A,  DEC 83
B,  DEC -23
C,  DEC 0
    END

Hexa code: 
0000,2004
0001,1005
0002,3006
0003,7001
0004,0053
0005,FFE9
0006,0000
----------
Binery code:
0000, 0010 0000 0000 0100
0001, 0001 0000 0000 0101
0010, 0011 0000 0000 0110
0011, 0111 0000 0000 0001
0100, 0000 0000 0101 0011
0101, 1111 1111 1110 1001
0110, 0000 0000 0000 0000
_______________

6

    ORG 100
    LDA SUB
    CMA
    INC
    ADD MIN
    STA DIF
    HLT
MIN,DEC 83
SUB,DEC -23
DIF,HEX 0
    END

Hexa code: 
0100,2107
0101,7200
0102,7020
0103,1106
0104,3108
0105,7001
0106,0053
0107,FFE9
0108,0000
----------
Binery code:
100000000, 0010 0001 0000 0111
100000001, 0111 0010 0000 0000
100000010, 0111 0000 0010 0000
100000011, 0001 0001 0000 0110
100000100, 0011 0001 0000 1000
100000101, 0111 0000 0000 0001
100000110, 0000 0000 0101 0011
100000111, 1111 1111 1110 1001
100001000, 0000 0000 0000 0000

_______________

13

    ORG 100
LOP,CLE
    LDA Y
    CIR
    STA Y
    SZE
    BUN ONE
    BUN ZRO
ONE,LDA X
    ADD P
    STA P
    CLE
ZRO,LDA X
    CIL
    STA X
    ISZ CTR
    BUN LOP
    HLT
CTR,DEC -8
X,  HEX 000F
Y,  HEX 000B
P,  HEX 0
    END

Hexa code:

0101,2113
0102,7080
0103,3113

0108,1114
0109,3114

010B,2112
010C,7040
010D,3112
010E,6111
010F,4100
0110,7001
0111,FFF8
0112,000F
0113,000B
0114,0000

_______________

17

    ORG 200
    LDA X
    BSA OR
    HEX 3AF6
    STA Y
    HLT
X,  HEX 7B95
Y,  HEX 0
OR, HEX 0
    CMA
    STA TMP
    LDA OR I
    CMA
    AND TMP
    CMA
    ISZ OR
    BUN OR I
TMP,HEX 0
    END

Hexa code:

0201,5207
0202,3AF6
0203,3206
0204,7001
0205,7B95
0206,0000
0207,0000
0208,7200
0209,3210
020A,A207
020B,7200
020C,0210
020D,7200
020E,6207
020F,C207
0210,0000
